languages.text: "Разве? Мы в ваших покоях, а не в исповедальной камере. Вы в полном здравии, к вам не применяются разнообразные интересные инструменты и методики, способствующие искренности. Уверяю, вы бы сразу поняли, если бы наша беседа превратилась в допрос".

"Does it? We're in your chambers, not a confessional cell. You're in perfectly good health, and none of the varied and fascinating instruments and procedures that expedite candour are being applied to you. I assure you, you would immediately know if our discussion turned into an interrogation."
languages.original_text: "Разве? Мы в ваших покоях, а не в исповедальной камере. Вы в полном здравии, к вам не применяются разнообразные интересные инструменты и методики, способствующие искренности. Уверяю, вы бы сразу поняли, если бы наша беседа превратилась в допрос".

traits.locale_text: "Does it? We're in your chambers, not in a confessional cell. You're in perfectly good health, and none of the varied and fascinating instruments and procedures that expedite forthrightness are being applied to you. I assure you, you would be able to tell right away if our discussion turned into an interrogation."

"Does it? We're in your chambers, not in a confessional cell. You're in perfectly good health, and none of the varied and fascinating instruments and procedures that expedite forthrightness are being applied to you. I assure you, you would be able to tell right away if our discussion turned into an interrogation."

"Does it? We're in your chambers, not in a confessional cell. You're in perfectly good health, and none of the varied and fascinating instruments and procedures that expedite candour are being applied to you. I assure you, you would immediately know if our discussion turned into an interrogation."

"Does it? We're in your chambers, not in a confessional cell. You're in perfectly good health, and none of the varied and fascinating instruments and procedures that expedite candour are being applied to you. I assure you, you would immediately know if our discussion turned into an interrogation."

"Does it? We're in your chambers, not in a confessional cell. You're in perfectly good health, and none of the varied and fascinating instruments and procedures that expedite candour are being applied to you. I assure you, you would immediately know if our discussion turned into an interrogation."

languages.text: 「そう思うのか？ここはお前の部屋だ、懺悔室ではない。お前は完全な健康体で、回答の誠実さを高めるために使うはずの多様な面白い器具類も手順もない。安心するがいい、話し合いが尋問になるかどうかはすぐに分かる」
languages.original_text: "Does it? We're in your chambers, not a confessional cell. You're in perfectly good health, and none of the varied and fascinating instruments and procedures that expedite candour are being applied to you. I assure you, you would immediately know if our discussion turned into an interrogation."

traits.locale_text: 「そう思うのか？ここはお前の部屋だ、懺悔室ではない。お前は完全な健康体で、回答の誠実さを高めるために使うはずの多様な面白い器具類も手順もない。安心するがいい、話し合いが尋問になるかどうかはすぐに分かる」

languages.original_text: "Does it? We're in your chambers, not in a confessional cell. You're in perfectly good health, and none of the varied and fascinating instruments and procedures that expedite candour are being applied to you. I assure you, you would immediately know if our discussion turned into an interrogation."

languages.text: “是吗？这里是你的房间，又不是忏悔室。你的身体状况非常良好，这里也没有那些趁手又迷人的小玩意，可以让你老老实实地快点开口。我可以向你保证，如果这场谈话不得不变成一场审讯，你会第一时间得知。”
languages.original_text: "Does it? We're in your chambers, not a confessional cell. You're in perfectly good health, and none of the varied and fascinating instruments and procedures that expedite candour are being applied to you. I assure you, you would immediately know if our discussion turned into an interrogation."

traits.locale_text: “是吗？这里是你的房间，又不是忏悔室。你的身体状况非常良好，这里也没有那些趁手又迷人的小玩意，可以让你老老实实地快点开口。我可以向你保证，如果这场谈话不得不变成一场审讯，你会第一时间得知。”

languages.text: «¿Ah, sí? Estamos en sus aposentos, y no en una celda de confesiones. Está en perfecto estado y no le estamos aplicando ninguno de los diversos y fascinantes instrumentos y métodos con los que aceleramos el candor de la gente. Le aseguro que, si en algún momento esta conversación se convierte en un interrogatorio, se dará cuenta al instante».
languages.original_text: "Does it? We're in your chambers, not a confessional cell. You're in perfectly good health, and none of the varied and fascinating instruments and procedures that expedite candour are being applied to you. I assure you, you would immediately know if our discussion turned into an interrogation."

traits.locale_text: «¿Ah, sí? Estamos en sus aposentos, y no en una celda de confesiones. Está en perfecto estado y no le estamos aplicando ninguno de los diversos y fascinantes instrumentos y métodos con los que aceleramos el candor de la gente. Le aseguro que, si en algún momento esta conversación se convierte en un interrogatorio, se dará cuenta al instante».

languages.text: « Vraiment ? Nous sommes pourtant dans vos quartiers, et non dans une cellule confessionnelle. N'êtes-vous pas présentement en bonne santé ? Avez-vous ne serait-ce qu'aperçu le moindre instrument généralement utilisé pour susciter la franchise ? Permettez-moi de vous rassurer : si cette discussion devait se transformer en interrogatoire, vous seriez {mf|le premier|la première} à le savoir. »
languages.original_text: "Does it? We're in your chambers, not a confessional cell. You're in perfectly good health, and none of the varied and fascinating instruments and procedures that expedite candour are being applied to you. I assure you, you would immediately know if our discussion turned into an interrogation."

traits.locale_text: « Vraiment ? Nous sommes pourtant dans vos quartiers, et non dans une cellule confessionnelle. N'êtes-vous pas présentement en bonne santé ? Avez-vous ne serait-ce qu'aperçu le moindre instrument généralement utilisé pour susciter la franchise ? Permettez-moi de vous rassurer : si cette discussion devait se transformer en interrogatoire, vous seriez {mf|le premier|la première} à le savoir. »

languages.text: "Tatsächlich? Wir befinden uns in Euren Gemächern, nicht in einer Beichtzelle. Ihr seid gesundheitlich unversehrt, und keines der vielen faszinierenden Instrumente zur Steigerung der Gesprächigkeit wird bei Euch angewendet. Ich versichere Euch, Ihr würdet es sofort merken, wenn aus unserem Gespräch ein Verhör würde."
languages.original_text: "Does it? We're in your chambers, not a confessional cell. You're in perfectly good health, and none of the varied and fascinating instruments and procedures that expedite candour are being applied to you. I assure you, you would immediately know if our discussion turned into an interrogation."

traits.locale_text: "Tatsächlich? Wir befinden uns in Euren Gemächern, nicht in einer Beichtzelle. Ihr seid gesundheitlich unversehrt, und keines der vielen faszinierenden Instrumente zur Steigerung der Gesprächigkeit wird bei Euch angewendet. Ich versichere Euch, Ihr würdet es sofort merken, wenn aus unserem Gespräch ein Verhör würde."

languages.text: "Öyle mi? Oysa odandayız, itiraf hücresinde değil. Sağlığın gayet yerinde ve gördüğün üzere doğruları söylemeni hızlandıracak envaiçeşit nefes kesici aygıtın ve prosedürün hiçbirini uygulamıyorum. Konuşmamız sorguya dönüşmüş olsaydı emin ol ki anında fark ederdin."
languages.original_text: "Does it? We're in your chambers, not a confessional cell. You're in perfectly good health, and none of the varied and fascinating instruments and procedures that expedite candour are being applied to you. I assure you, you would immediately know if our discussion turned into an interrogation."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle mi? Senin odandayız, bir itiraf hücresinde değil. Son derece sağlıklı durumdasın ve doğruları söylemeni hızlandıracak o sayısız büyüleyici aygıtın ve prosedürün hiçbirisi üzerinde kullanılmıyor. Seni temin ederim ki konuşmamız bir sorguya dönüştüğünde bunun gayet farkında olursun."
